summary:
Beautiful, better and less annoying version of Muiri :) designed by woman.
Cosmetic changes only.
descriptionHtml:
To work good mod requires:
	
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168 
Covereyes by mrLenski http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869
(All links you can find by clicking on \"required files\" near \"Actions:\")

If You\'re married to Muiri I definitely recommend mod Resolving Muiri\'s Problem by lionSpirit http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8048 . Her talking about her \"problem\"can be annoying. Thanks to lionSpirit now she\'s full of love and adventure talking :)

I\'m also using Caliente\'s Female Bdy Mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666) and Bettef Females by Bella (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812).
author: Eyelieah
